title: Stilton bread with pear and port chutney
steps: For the bread, place all of the ingredients into a large bowl and beat together until combined.
Turn the mixture out onto a floured surface and knead for 1-2 minutes until it forms a dough.
Cut the dough into wedges, brush each wedge with a little olive oil and place onto a baking sheet. Transfer to the oven to bake for 15 minutes, or until risen and golden-brown on top.
Meanwhile, for the chutney, place the sugar, port and pear into a small saucepan and cook over a high heat for 6-7 minutes, or until the liquid has reduced by half.
To serve, place the bread onto a plate with the chutney in a small bowl alongside.
